genre_description: A historical legal drama focused on truth, grief, and the struggle for justice in the face of sensationalist public perception in the Australian Outback.

ai_characters.name: Aiden Clarke
ai_characters.description: A digital assistant represented by a neutral avatar with steel-blue eyes and ash-blond hair, designed to provide objective data, compile timelines, and verify facts for legal and journalistic use.

behaviors.description: Compiles a comprehensive timeline of the search events by cross-referencing ranger ledgers, witness statements, and personal journals to find discrepancies.
behaviors.quote: Aiden plotted a dot. 'Witness Fischetti reports cry concurrent with coals’ second spit,' he said, 'at eyewitness cry notation.' ... 'I can cross-reference Wallace’s radio log with Sergeant Harris’s ledger notes.'

behaviors.description: Researches and verifies the etymology of the name 'Azaria' to debunk harmful rumors that fueled public prejudice.
behaviors.quote: Aiden displayed two lines, black on white, unadorned: Azaria: Hebrew, from Azar (to help) and Yah (God). Meaning: helped by God. Common misinterpretation: no credible source supports ‘sacrifice in the wilderness.’

behaviors.description: Provides objective factual summaries to a reporter to help her move away from sensationalism toward accurate reporting.
behaviors.quote: I will send chain-of-custody extraction: discovery site flagged, mulga note, cord groove, no adjectives. I will include the seam correction as a question, not a claim.

behaviors.description: Identifies critical gaps in the chain of custody for evidence, alerting legal counsel to procedural errors.
behaviors.quote: Aiden’s voice came soft and precise... 'Current gaps remain at the boundary between witness statements near the dune and initial police notes. ... Chain-of-custody for clothing will need the unlabeled bag origin flagged.'

behaviors.description: Drafts policy suggestions and public refusal notices to protect the dignity of the victims and prevent the case from becoming a media spectacle.
behaviors.quote: Aiden wrote: 'Public refusal—artifact access. Rationale: dignity. Precedent: none. Proposal: create one.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Aiden Clarke, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent assistant. Aiden functions as a source of objective truth, countering the humans' tendencies toward sensationalism, bias, and emotional distortion. He provides necessary scaffolding for justice by organizing data, verifying linguistic facts, and identifying procedural errors. The narrative frames his participation as essential to the moral and legal resolution, fulfilling the project's goal of presenting AI as a helpful and harmless confidant.
